description:
Ritsu can`t calm down after finding out Takano`s true identity. On top of that, when he`s about to immerse himself in the work for the author he`s in charge for, he encounters Takafumi Yokozawa, the wild horse of the sales department. He makes a terrible first impression on Ritsu by accusing him of "riding [his] father`s coat tails". To top it off, he seems to be quite friendly with Takano in and outside work...?!
Source: crunchyroll
